attributes.action: make a statement as to why a petition signed by 1.8 million people appears to have been ignored
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the announcement of the further introduction of road charging it appears that this petition process is a process used by the government to humour the population rather than listening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
